mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_JOIN_STUDY(JOIN_STUDY_ID, STUDY_ID, USER_ID) VALUES(S_JOIN_STUDY.NEXTVAL, #{studyId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_JOIN_STUDY WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDY_ID, STUDY_NAME, STUDY_ONLINE, STUDY_AREA, STUDY_TOPIC, STUDY_NOTICE, STUDY_SEARCH, STUDY_COMPLETE, STUDY_REGISTER_DATE, STUDY_UPDATE_DATE FROM T_STUDY S JOIN T_JOIN_STUDY J ON S.STUDY_ID = J.STUDY_ID WHERE J.USER_ID = #{userId} AND JOIN_STUDY_JOIN = 1 ORDER BY JOIN_STUDY_REGISTER_DATE
SELECT U.USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL FROM T_JOIN_STUDY J JOIN T_USER U ON J.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND JOIN_STUDY_JOIN = 1 ORDER BY JOIN_STUDY_REGISTER_DATE
